inclusion.criterion: mother is aged 19 years or older
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: dyads currently live in the Halifax Regional Municipality in Nova Scotia
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: the baby is a healthy singleton baby who is younger than 6 weeks of age, and is fed mother's milk directly from the breast and from a bottle
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: mother plans to exclusively feed their baby mother's own milk up to 6 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: mother has/had an older child whom they successfully fed mother's own milk for a minimum of 6 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: mother is willing to participate in three 3-day study sessions and monthly measurement sessions, and
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: mother provides informed consent for herself and her infant to participate
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: the baby is a first child
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: the mother had a normal pregnancy with no complication
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: the baby was born preterm (earlier than 37 weeks gestation)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: the baby has a developmental delay diagnosed before the time of enrolment
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 5 months old male with an undescended testis. The mother had a normal pregnancy and the baby is breast feeding.
